body_html:
The last error Check failed: s.ok() could not find cudnnCreate in cudnn DSO; dlerror: cudnnCreate not found was due to a bad copy on my part so CUDA couldn't find the libraries it needed.

To recap for future viewers:

  1. I had to make sure I had the proper version of CuDNN downloaded. (In my case version 5.1)
  2. Once I had downloaded and extracted CuDNN, I had to ensure that cuda/bin was discoverable on my PATH.
body_text:
The last error Check failed: s.ok() could not find cudnnCreate in cudnn DSO; dlerror: cudnnCreate not found was due to a bad copy on my part so CUDA couldn't find the libraries it needed.
To recap for future viewers:

I had to make sure I had the proper version of CuDNN downloaded. (In my case version 5.1)
Once I had downloaded and extracted CuDNN, I had to ensure that cuda/bin was discoverable on my PATH.
body:
The last error `Check failed: s.ok() could not find cudnnCreate in cudnn DSO; dlerror: cudnnCreate not found` was due to a bad copy on my part so CUDA couldn't find the libraries it needed. 

To recap for future viewers:
 1. I had to make sure I had the proper version of CuDNN downloaded. (In my case version 5.1)
 2. Once I had downloaded and extracted CuDNN, I had to ensure that `cuda/bin` was discoverable on my `PATH`.
